name: MAGNETS! How do they work?!
description:
You are a Magnet! But how does it work? 

Knock the other players off the screen to win! :D

Turn your character using the left stick, the magnetic forces will pull you around the playing field. Press any button to activate a forceboost that multiplies your magnetic powers.

Attract other players and then turn around to push them off the screen. Be aware of the moving map boundaries. 

Attract some friends for maximum magnetic fun! :D

Credits:
